headline: Paycom Promotes Shane Hadlock to President
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, February 19, 2026--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, today announced the promotion of Shane Hadlock to president, effective immediately. Hadlock will serve as president and chief client officer, overseeing the company’s strategic operations, cross-functional alignment and continued execution of Paycom’s full-solution automation strategy.
